dataObjects.title: Auchenipterichthys longimanus
dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: "Auchenipterichthys longimanus." Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia. 13 Dec 2012, 02:46 UTC. 15 Mar 2013 <http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Auchenipterichthys_longimanus&oldid=542875608>.
dataObjects.description:
Auchenipterichthys longimanus is a species of driftwood catfish endemic to Brazil where it is found in the Amazon River basin. It grows to a length of 15 cm.

References

  • Froese, Rainer, and Daniel Pauly, eds. (2011). "Auchenipterichthys longimanus" in FishBase. December 2011 version.
This catfish-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
